    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultDerivedRequirement

        public DefaultDerivedRequirement(BaseRequirement baseRequirement,
                                 String id,
                                 String statement,
                                 RequirementType type,
                                 boolean conditional,
                                 String message)
        Constructs a derived requirement. A message may contain a variable placeholder using the {} symbols.
        Parameters:
        baseRequirement - the base requirement this requirement is derived from
        id - the derived requirement id
        statement - the statement describing the derived requirement
        type - the type of requirement
        conditional - if the requirement is conditional (e.g., "if X, them Y")
        message - an optional message to use if the requirement fails

      • isConditional

        public boolean isConditional()
        Description copied from interface: DerivedRequirement
        Indicates if the requirement nature is conditional. For example: If A, B MUST be true. Or: B MUST be true, if A
        Specified by:
        isConditional in interface DerivedRequirement
        Returns:
        true if the requirement is conditional, or false otherwise
